data.title: REMINDER AND CONFIRMATION OF ADVISORY SUBCOMMITTEE MEETING DATES AND TIMES
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The Cannabis Advisory Committee will be holding a series of Subcommittee Meetings on Tuesday, February 13 in Sacramento. Ten Subcommittees will meet to discuss and develop recommendations to the state cannabis licensing authoritiesâ€™ formal rulemaking packages. The agenda and meeting materials for each Subcommittee Meeting can be found here. All Subcommittee Meetings are open to […]
